segments.text: I'm in a good mood today , actually . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: to be honest , I'm a bit fed up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: there's a girl in my company that I really like but I always get shy when she is around .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see ! Do you want to ask her out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you can ask her out for drink after work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: but for what reasons ? She doesn't even know who I am .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: then you've got a lot of homework to do . You need to get her notice first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you can start by meeting her at the bus stop and saying hello to her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: but I always get tongue-tied when I see her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's something you need to overcome . Men should make the first move as most of girls prefer being chased .
segments.speaker: S2
